name: Splendor
title: Splendor
description:
During the game, the players take gem and gold tokens. With these tokens, they purchase development cards,
which are worth prestige points and/or bonuses. These bonuses allow players to purchase subsequent
development cards for a lesser cost. When a player has enough bonuses, they immediately receive a visit
from a noble (which is also worth prestige points).
As soon as a player reaches 15 prestige points, the current turn ends and the player
with the most prestige points is declared the winner

expansions.name: Cities of Splendor
expansions.title: Splendor: Cities of Splendor
expansions.description:
Cities of Splendor is an expansion for Splendor that adds four new modules to the game. Each module can be played separately or combined with others. The modules are: 
- The Orient: Players can now buy cards from the Orient, which are worth more points and have different bonuses.
- The Guilds: Players can now buy guild cards, which give them special abilities.
- The Trade Routes: Players can now buy trade route cards, which give them bonuses for collecting certain types of cards.
- The Cities: Players can now buy city cards, which give them bonuses for collecting certain types of cards.
